privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: MoveWorth ("the Service") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.section1Content:
We may collect the following information:

• Account information: Name, email address, nationality (provided during registration)
• Simulation data: Income, expenses, tax rates, and other simulation inputs
• Usage information: Access logs, browser information, IP address, usage patterns
• Cookies: Used for session management and saving user preferences
privacy.section2Content:
We use collected information for the following purposes:

• Providing and improving our simulation service
• Managing and authenticating user accounts
• Analyzing service usage (Google Analytics)
• Providing customer support
• Sending service-related notifications
privacy.section3Content: Your personal information is securely stored on Supabase (cloud database). Some simulation history is stored in your browser's local storage. We implement appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, and data breaches.
privacy.section4Content:
We do not share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases:

• With your consent
• When required by law
• With service providers necessary for operation (Supabase, Vercel, Google Analytics, etc.)
privacy.section5Content: We use Google Analytics to analyze site usage. We may also use Google AdSense for advertising. These services use cookies to collect data. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may be limited.
privacy.section6Content: Account information is retained while your account is active. Upon account deletion request, we will delete your personal information within a reasonable period. Usage logs are retained for up to 12 months, then anonymized or deleted.
privacy.section7Content:
You have the following rights:

• Request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information
• Request to stop the use of your personal information
• Delete your account

Please contact us through the Contact page to exercise these rights.
privacy.section8Content: This policy may be updated without prior notice due to legal changes or service updates. We will notify you of significant changes through the Service.
privacy.contactContent: For questions or requests regarding privacy, please contact us through the Contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of MoveWorth ("the Service"). Please read these Terms carefully before using the Service.
terms.section1Content: The Service provides a web-based asset simulation tool for users considering international relocation, based on income, expenses, tax information, and other financial data.
terms.section2Content: Account registration via email is required to use the simulation features. Information provided during registration must be accurate and current. You are responsible for managing your account credentials.
terms.section3Content: The Service offers a free plan (Free) and paid plans (Pro, Premium). Pricing, features, and payment terms for paid plans are described on the Pricing page. Prices for paid plans may change without prior notice.
terms.section4Content:
Simulation results provided by the Service are estimates based on input data and general economic indicators, and do not guarantee actual future asset values. Tax systems, exchange rates, inflation rates, and other factors fluctuate, so actual results may differ.

The Service assumes no responsibility for relocation or financial decisions made based on our results. Please consult professionals (financial planners, tax advisors, etc.) for important decisions.
terms.section5Content:
The following activities are prohibited:

• Unauthorized use or reverse engineering of the Service
• Harassment of other users
• Account registration with false information
• Interfering with Service operations
• Unauthorized reproduction or redistribution of Service content
• Automated mass access using bots or scripts
terms.section6Content: All content within the Service (text, design, logos, software, etc.) is the intellectual property of the Service or its licensors.
terms.section7Content: The Service may modify, suspend, or terminate operations without prior notice. The Service is not liable for any damages resulting from such changes.
terms.section8Content: The Service is provided "as is." No express or implied warranties are made regarding accuracy, completeness, reliability, or fitness for a particular purpose. The Service is not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the Service.
terms.section9Content: The Service may update these Terms at any time. Updated Terms become effective upon posting on the Service. We will notify you of significant changes via registered email or through the Service.
terms.section10Content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Japan. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court as the court of first instance.
terms.contactContent: For questions regarding these Terms, please contact us through the Contact page.
